title: A combination of chitosan nanoparticles loaded with celecoxib and kartogenin has anti-inflammatory and chondroprotective effects: Results from an in vitro model of osteoarthritis
content:
Publication date: 30 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 10

Author(s): Zahra Nabizadeh, Mahmoud Nasrollahzadeh, Benjamin Kruppke, Davood Nasrabadi
